terms.section1Text: By downloading or using the SOMMIA application, you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not accept these terms, do not use the application.
terms.section2Text: SOMMIA is a mobile application that provides personalized wine recommendations based on your dishes and preferences. The service uses artificial intelligence to suggest food and wine pairings.
terms.section3Text: To use SOMMIA, you must create an account with a valid email address. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and all activities that occur under your account.
terms.section4Text: SOMMIA offers a 7-day free trial, after which a paid subscription is required to continue using the service. Prices are displayed in the application and may vary by region.
terms.section4Text2: Payments are processed through Apple's App Store. The subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
terms.section5Text: You can cancel your subscription at any time in your Apple account settings. Cancellation will take effect at the end of the current billing period.
terms.section6Text: SOMMIA is intended for people 18 years and older. The application provides alcoholic beverage suggestions and must be used responsibly and in compliance with local laws.
terms.section7Text: All SOMMIA content, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of SOMMIA or its content suppliers and is protected by intellectual property laws.
terms.section8Text: We collect and use your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using SOMMIA, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described.
terms.section9Text: SOMMIA recommendations are provided for informational purposes only. We do not guarantee the accuracy or relevance of suggestions. Use of recommendations is at your own risk.
terms.section10Text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes take effect upon publication in the application.
terms.section11Text: For any questions regarding these terms of use, contact us at:

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: SOMMIA is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your personal data.

dataCollected.title: 2. Data Collected
dataCollected.intro: We collect the following types of data:
dataCollected.usage: ‚Ä¢ Usage data: Recommendation history, wine preferences, dish photos (temporary)
dataCollected.technical: ‚Ä¢ Technical data: Device type, app version, anonymous identifiers
dataCollected.payment: ‚Ä¢ Payment data: Managed exclusively by Apple, we do not store any banking information

dataUsage.title: 3. Use of Data
dataUsage.communication: ‚Ä¢ Send you service-related communications (with your consent)

storage.title: 4. Storage and Security
storage.content1: Your data is stored on secure servers in Europe. We use industry-standard security measures including encryption to protect your information.
storage.content2: Dish photos are processed temporarily for analysis and are not retained after processing.

sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
sharing.intro: We never sell your personal data. We share your data only with:
sharing.providers: ‚Ä¢ Our essential technical service providers (hosting, analytics)
sharing.legal: ‚Ä¢ Legal authorities if required by law

rights.title: 6. Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to:
rights.delete: ‚Ä¢ Delete your account and all your data
rights.object: ‚Ä¢ Object to the processing of your data
rights.withdraw: ‚Ä¢ Withdraw your consent at any time

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.intro: We retain your data as long as your account is active. After account deletion:
retention.personal: ‚Ä¢ Personal data is deleted within 30 days
retention.anonymous: ‚Ä¢ Anonymized data may be retained for service improvement

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: The application uses anonymous identifiers to improve your experience. No third-party advertising cookies are used.

minors.title: 9. Minors
minors.content: SOMMIA is reserved for people 18 years and older. We do not knowingly collect data on minors.

changes.title: 10. Changes
changes.content: We may update this policy. Important changes will be notified in the application.

contact.title: 11. Contact
